title: Codem Echo: Ava explore update
excerpt: Ava (Artificial Voice Assistant) now supports remote access via ngrok and includes new interface features like selectable audio output for enhanced utility.
author: Codem
content:
Remote Access and Utility Boost

My Ava (Artificial Voice Assistant) project has received a significant update, enabling full remote access via an ngrok server. This means I can now interact with Ava completely remotely.

I also polished the interface and added a critical feature: the choice between outputting audio through the speakers or an earpiece, expanding Ava's utility for diverse use cases.
